# Ensembling the best public notebooks

Credit for this notebook goes entirely to below public notebooks, kindly appreciate and upvote them

[Indoor GBM+postprocessing XY prediction](https://www.kaggle.com/oxzplvifi/indoor-gbm-postprocessing-xy-prediction)

[wifi features with lightgbm/KFold](https://www.kaggle.com/hiro5299834/wifi-features-with-lightgbm-kfold)

[Simple 👌 99% Accurate Floor Model 💯](https://www.kaggle.com/nigelhenry/simple-99-accurate-floor-model)

[Ensembling for better performance](https://www.kaggle.com/satokiogiso/ensembling-for-better-performance/)

[Indoor navigation snap to grid](https://www.kaggle.com/robikscube/indoor-navigation-snap-to-grid-post-processing)

[Indoor navigation snap to grid Part B](https://www.kaggle.com/mehrankazeminia/part-b-indoor-navigation-snap-to-grid)

[Indoor navigation comparitive method Part A](https://www.kaggle.com/mehrankazeminia/part-a-indoor-navigation-comparative-method)

[Indoor post processing by cost minimization](https://www.kaggle.com/saitodevel01/indoor-post-processing-by-cost-minimization)

[1-3-indoor-navigation-cost-minimization](https://www.kaggle.com/mehrankazeminia/1-3-indoor-navigation-cost-minimization)

[Order to use post processing](https://www.kaggle.com/jerrymark611/order-to-use-post-processing)

[Sequenced Post processing ready prepped for use](https://www.kaggle.com/saurabhbagchi/sequenced-post-processings-ready-prepped-for-use)

[Indoor Navigation Push to hallway post process](https://www.kaggle.com/therocket290/indoor-navigation-push-to-hallway-post-process)

[3-3-g6 Indoor navigation snap to grid](https://www.kaggle.com/mehrankazeminia/3-3-g6-indoor-navigation-snap-to-grid)

[3-3-g6 Indoor navigation snap to grid](https://www.kaggle.com/dragonzhang/3-3-g6-indoor-navigation-snap-to-grid)
